resources.string: Send a Mail with no Attachments
Play a Music based on Search Query

Commands available are- 
1.Alarm hhmm /message ### 
2.Timer ss /message ### 
3.Calender title #### location #### hbhe 
4.Image or camera photo 
5.Video 
6.Contact name ### ##@## 
7.Mail ##@### subject ### 
8.Music or play artist ### 
9.Call ##### 
10.Web search ##### 
11.Wi-fi 
12.Youtube #### 
13.Maps ### 
14.Navigation ### 
15.Chrome ###
Speech to text using Google API
For using Voice Assistant either click on mike to speak or type the command manually in the input field from drop down menu
